portfolio.portfolio_content:
I am currently working on this section.

In the meantime, you can see my work on PDFs:

projects.title: Top-Level Domain Opening
projects.content: I helped NIC Argentina to launch the opening of the top-level domain to users.

projects.title: Blockchain Timestamp App
projects.content: I helped BFA to make a usable timestamp tool.

projects.title: Nearpod Image Quiz
projects.content: I helped Nearpod to design a new feature for the quiz activity.

projects.title: The Web Through Me
projects.content: I’ve been in charge of Viñetas Sueltas' website since 2008 and this is that story.

projects.title: Nearpod Motion UI
projects.content: I helped Nearpod to adapt a new features to their iOS application.

projects.title: UX Workshop
projects.content: This is the final report (Spanish) of the UX Workshop I did back in 2018.

projects.title: Visual Designs
projects.content: A mix of designs for large companies like Microsoft, Personal, Saks and T-Mobile.

projects.title: Reel
projects.content: You can watch my Motion Graphics Reel on Vimeo.

projects.title: Art
projects.content: You can see my illustration portfolio on Tumblr.
